info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 6:00PM CDT until May 19 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Fort Worth TX
info.description:
At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Jo, or 9 miles east of Nocona, moving east at 30 mph.
THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR LOCATIONS NEAR ST. JO, CAPPS CORNER, AND BULCHER.
HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 65 mph wind gusts.
SOURCE...Emergency management.
IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles.
Locations impacted include... St. Jo, Lake Nocona, Bulcher, Capps Corner, Nocona Hills, Bowie, Hubert H Moss Lake, Myra, Nocona, Fruitland, Montague, Muenster, Ringgold, Forestburg, Illinois Bend, Sunset, Marysville, Lake Amon G Carter, Stoneburg, and Lake Muenster.
info.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Texas.
For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows.
This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Fort Worth.
Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

parameter.value: A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR MONTAGUE AND NORTHWESTERN COOKE COUNTIES
NWS:DESTRUCTIVE HAIL STORM in this area til 700 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING in effect for this area until 7:00 PM CDT for DESTRUCTIVE baseball size hail. Take shelter in a sturdy building, away from windows. People and animals outdoors will be severely injured.

parameter.value: A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR MONTAGUE AND NORTHWESTERN COOKE COUNTIES
SNM:TORMENTA DE GRANIZO DESTRUCTIVA en esta area hasta 700 PM CDT. Tome refugio ahora

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORMENTA SEVERA en efecto para esta area hasta las 7:00 PM CDT por granizo DESTRUCTIVO del tamano de una pelota de beisbol. Tome refugio en un edificio, alejado de las ventanas. Las personas y los animales al aire libre seran gravemente heridos.
